summary: This document consists of administrative count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 14, 2019. It includes out-count forms, official count slips, and an inmate roster, primarily documenting the prison's population management procedures on that date.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative process of counting inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including out-counts and official counts across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records prison administrative activities on August 14, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It includes out-count forms that must be submitted 45 minutes prior to the affected count, grouping inmates by housing unit.
An inmate roster shows a transaction for an inmate with assignment 'TNWDVR' (likely Transportation/Work Driver) was successfully completed.
A Bureau of Prisons count sheet shows a total census of 756 inmates across various housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, etc.).
Multiple official count slips are included, though most staff names and inmate names are not listed in the provided text.
